must_haves: Warm hat or thin beanie (fits under helmet)

weather_notes.cold_stormy: Full helmet + goggles mandatory; exposed skin risks frostbite; sunglasses not usable.
weather_notes.sunny_warm: Helmet ventilation critical; sunglasses often replace goggles.
weather_notes.whiteout: High-contrast goggle lens critical; navigation more difficult.

must_haves: Mid layer insulation (fleece or light down)

weather_notes.cold_stormy: Hardshell + insulation required; stopping for long breaks risky.
weather_notes.sunny_warm: Often skinning in base layer; hardshell stays in pack.
weather_notes.windy: Windproof layer critical even if temperatures mild.

weather_notes.cold_stormy: Mittens preferred; exposed hands quickly lose dexterity.
weather_notes.sunny_warm: Liner gloves often sufficient for ascent.
weather_notes.windy: Insulated gloves required even at moderate temperatures.

weather_notes.cold_stormy: Layering critical; immobility increases heat loss.
weather_notes.sunny_warm: Often no base layer needed during ascent.
weather_notes.deep_powder: Proper gaiters or powder cuffs necessary.

must_haves: Ski touring boots (walk mode, tech inserts)

weather_notes.cold: Thin socks still preferred; circulation more important than thickness.
weather_notes.spring_conditions: Wet feet risk blisters; sock choice critical.

weather_notes.icy: Ski crampons essential; skin traction insufficient.
weather_notes.deep_powder: Wide skis improve flotation but increase effort.
weather_notes.wet_snow: Skin glue failure possible; backup skin wax recommended.
weather_notes.wind_scoured: Edge control critical; lightweight skis may struggle.

weather_notes.cold: Insulated bottles required; hydration hoses freeze.
weather_notes.long_days: Proper weight distribution critical for fatigue management.

weather_notes.fresh_snow: Avalanche risk elevated; conservative terrain choice required.
weather_notes.wind_loading: Slab formation likely; safety gear non-negotiable.

must_haves: GPS device or smartphone with offline maps

weather_notes.whiteout: GPS and compass essential; visual navigation unreliable.
weather_notes.short_days: Headlamp mandatory even for day tours.

must_haves: Repair kit (multi-tool, ski straps, duct tape)

weather_notes.any_conditions: Injury or delay always possible; rescue may be slow.
weather_notes.cold: Hypothermia risk increases rapidly when stopped.
Food freezes; keep close to body.
